name: WereGarurumon: Sagittarius Mode
effect: [Your Turn] While a Digimon card with [WereGarurumon] in its name is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, this Digimon gains ＜Jamming＞. (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon.)
digivolve_effect: [All Turns] While this Digimon has [Garurumon] or [Omnimon] in its name, it gets +1000 DP.
